import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { NumofpeopleContext } from '../../NumofpeopleContext' import Preheader from '../homecomponents/Preheader' import Navigation from '../homecomponents/Navigation' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './hotelssection.css' import { useState } from 'react' const Hotelssection = (props) => { const [numofpeople,setNumofpeople] = useContext(NumofpeopleContext) const [hotels,setHotels] = useState([]) const getDefaultHotels = async () => { const gethotels = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/hotels'); const data = await gethotels.json() setHotels(data) } let filterNumofPeople = hotels.filter(each => each.numofpeople >= parseInt(numofpeople)) useEffect(() => { getDefaultHotels() },[]) const {t,i18n} = props return ( <>

{t('hotelsearch.1')}

{t('home.1')}

/

{t('hotelsearch.1')}

{t('default.1')}

{t('low.1')}

{t('high.1')}

{filterNumofPeople.map(hotel => { return(

{hotel.title}

{t('shortdesc.1')}

{t('starting.1')} {hotel.price}$

L

{t('details.1')}

) })}

{t('reservation.1')}

) } export default Hotelssection
